SEARCH
Package clack.cipher

Class PlayfairCipher

java.lang.Object
clack.cipher.PlayfairCipher
public class PlayfairCipher extends Object
PlayfairCipher class is used for encrypting/decrypting text using the Playfair Cipher method. PlayfairCipher uses a 5x5 matrix to encrypt and decrypt pairs of letters. This class replaces the letter 'J' with the letter 'I', as there are 26 letters in the alphabet and only 25 (5x5) spaces in the matrix. 'J' is one of the most uncommon letters in the English language, so that is why we chose to replace it with 'I'.

    Constructs a PlayFairCipher instance and generates the 5x5 matrix.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayfairCipher

      public PlayfairCipher(String key)
      Constructs a PlayFairCipher instance and generates the 5x5 matrix.
      Parameters:
      key - is the keyword that is used in the matrix.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the key is just a null value.

  • Method Details

    • encrypt

      public String encrypt(String plaintext)
      encrypt performs encryption of a plaintext message by implementing the checkPairs(String, boolean) method. checkPairs(String, boolean) is a method used for both encryption and decryption.
      Parameters:
      plaintext - is the plaintext that needs to be encrypted.
      Returns:
      the final message from checkPairs(String, boolean) (if plaintext is null, encrypt returns null).

    • decrypt

      public String decrypt(String ciphertext)
      decrypt performs decryption of an encrypted message by implementing the checkPairs(String, boolean) method. checkPairs(String, boolean) is a method used for both encryption and decryption.
      Parameters:
      ciphertext - is the encrypted text that needs to be decrypted.
      Returns:
      the final message from checkPairs(String, boolean) (if ciphertext is null, then decrypt returns null).

    • prep

      public String prep(String text)
      prep prepares the plaintext for encryption. It converts the text to uppercase letters, and it replaces all the 'J' letters with 'I' letters. prep also removes non-alphabetic characters and checks if the text length is even/odd. prep also adds padding for repeating characters.
      Parameters:
      text - is the plaintext that needs to be prepared for encryption.
      Returns:
      the prepared text that is ready for encryption or null if text is null.

    • checkPairs

      public String checkPairs(String text, boolean encrypt)
      checkPairs is a method used for both encryption and decryption.
      Parameters:
      text - is the text that needs to be encrypted/decrypted.
      encrypt - is true for encryption and false for decryption.
      Returns:
      finalMessage (the text after being encrypted/decrypted).
